content: The financials we are revising are as follows; net income, lowering from a range of $45 million to $49 million to a range of $39 million to $43 million; diluted EPS, lowering from a range of $1.11 to $1.21 to a range of $0.96 to $1.06; adjusted net income, lowering from a range of $52 million to $56 million to a range of $49 million to $53 million; adjusted diluted EPS, lowering from a range of $1.28 to $1.38 to a range of $1.21 to $1.31; and lastly, given the changes in tax regulations, we are raising our fiscal year 2023 adjusted effective tax rate from 30% to 33%.
